channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Inflows into crypto investment funds rise as Bitcoin carries 99% of the load
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: However, Ethereum saw outflows in the amount of $2 million and remains the asset with the most outflows year-to-date.

item.title: Ripple’s major success in its court battle with the SEC: Law Decoded, July 10–17
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: Ripple Labs scored a partial victory in its lengthy legal battle with the United States Securities and Exchange Commission, which dates back to 2020.

item.title: XRP tops BTC in trading volume as it continues to savor partial victory in SEC suit
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: XRP gained 1% over Bitcoin in volume between June 17 and July 17, with U.S. exchanges listing it again and international support never failing, Kaiko found.

item.title: SEC v. Ripple referred to judge who ordered release of ‘Hinman Documents’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Judge Analisa Torres has sent the remaining issues in the SEC v. Ripple case to Magistrate Judge Sarah Netburn.

item.title: Price analysis 7/17: SPX, DXY, BTC, ETH, XRP, BNB, SOL, ADA, DOGE, MATIC
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Rakesh Upadhyay
item.description: Bitcoin bulls have failed to step in, increasing the chance for a retest of the $29,500 support.

item.title: Binance cuts back on employee benefits, citing ‘decline in profit’: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The crypto exchange reportedly stopped offering reimbursement to employees for certain expenses, including the use of mobile phones, fitness and working from home.

item.title: Bitcoin and crypto brace for further upside as equities look to extend their recent gains
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brian Nibley
item.description: A variety of macro factors propelled the recent rally across several asset classes, but analysts are at odds regarding the sustainability of the current bullish trend.

item.title: Euro stablecoin market set to take off, thanks to real-world uses, regulatory clarity — Circle exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: Circle’s Patrick Hansen provided an overview of the euro-denominated stablecoin market at EthCC: It all looks rosy, he said.

item.title: Bitcoin ‘full breakout’ not here yet as BTC price spends month at $30K
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price targets extend down to $27,000 with Bitcoin in a state of “flux.”

item.title: Elon Musk’s new AI startup is as ambitious as it is doomed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: The public perception surrounding AI’s abilities is no match for the laws of physics.

item.title: Ripple CLO says court ruling could encourage banks to adopt XRP: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: A July 13 court ruling in Ripple’s legal battle with the SEC suggested XRP may not necessarily be a security, a decision that has already made significant waves in the space.

item.title: How to earn passive income with peer-to-peer lending
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jagjit Singh
item.description: P2P lending is a way for individuals to lend money directly to other individuals without involving traditional financial institutions, such as banks.

item.title: 7 payment gateways for fast online transactions
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Explore seven payment gateways prioritizing speed and efficiency, ensuring fast, seamless online transactions.

item.title: How Chainflip is shaking up native cryptocurrency cross-chain swaps
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: By enabling cross-chain swaps of cryptocurrency, Cointelegraph Innovation Circle member Simon Harman is shaking up DeFi.

item.title: AI Eye: AI content cannibalization problem, Threads a loss leader for AI data?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Andrew Fenton
item.description: The reason AIs will always need humans, religous chatbots urge death to infidels, and is Threads’ real purpose to generate AI training data?

item.title: Lost keys have already cost billions of dollars, many more at risk — Polygon exec
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Polygon’s Mudit Gupta said that despite moving fast in theoretical security, the crypto space is “so far behind” when it comes to practical security.

item.title: zkSync launches new STARK-based proof system with a focus on mass usability
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The latest proof system promises better throughput than the current 100 TPS rate and reduces costs in the long term.

item.title: Philippines Blockchain Council exec sees crypto adoption ‘snowballing’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Donald Lim believes blockchain and Web3 projects have the “opportunity to flourish” in the country.

item.title: FSB finalizes its recommendations for a global crypto framework
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By David Attlee
item.description: The Financial Stability Board states that crypto platforms must segregate clients’ digital assets from their own funds and clearly separate functions to avoid conflict of interest.

item.title: BTC traders brace for $30K loss — 5 things to know in Bitcoin this week
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: BTC price performance is worrying market participants in the short term, but the signs of broader Bitcoin accumulation are there.

item.title: Unstoppable Domains adds .eth domains through Ethereum Name Service
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: Unstoppable Domains and Ethereum Name Service have dominated the decentralized domain name space as competitors — until now.

item.title: National Australia Bank joins crypto exchange boycott, cites ‘scams’
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: National Australia Bank is the latest bank to announce blocks on certain cryptocurrency exchanges, citing the high risk of scams.

item.title: AnubisDAO’s rug-pulled 13.5K ETH washes away on Tornado Cash
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Arijit Sarkar
item.description: After almost two years, the stolen 13,556 ETH, worth nearly $60 million at the time, amounted to almost $26.2 million at the time of writing.

item.title: How easy is a SIM swap attack? Here’s how to prevent one
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: As SIM swap attacks are often seen as non-demanding regarding technical skills, users must be diligent with their identity security.

item.title: A simple tile game is spiking daily txs on Sui Network — Data platform
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Martin Young
item.description: Launched in October, Sui 8192 is a fully-on-chain tile-sliding puzzle game that records each move as a transaction on the Sui Network.

item.title: Nifty News: Metaverse bank robberies, Trump NFT biz prefers crypto over cash and more
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Jesse Coghlan
item.description: The Bank of America’s metaverse trains staff on resolving customer disputes or helps them relax by riding a virtual unicorn.

item.title: Binance completes integration of Bitcoin Lightning Network
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: The news comes less than a month after Binance announced their plans to integrate Bit Lightning Network.

item.title: Aave Protocol launches stablecoin GHO on Ethereum mainnet, $2M minted
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Mitchelhill
item.description: Decentralized finance protocol Aave has finally launched its new algorithmic dollar-pegged stablecoin GHO on Ethereum.

item.title: Ripple case: SEC appeal unlikely as agency gains from ‘current confusion’ — Haun Ventures CEO
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: An immediate appeal could potentially jeopardize the SEC’s “entire enforcement agenda” if it ends up losing, said Katie Haun of Haun Ventures.

item.title: Ripple decision is ‘troublesome on multiple fronts,’ says former SEC official
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ana Paula Pereira
item.description: John Reed Stark, a former attorney in the Securities and Exchange Commission’s Enforcement Division, says the ruling in favor of Ripple Labs “resides on shaky ground.”
